Lomonosov Moscow State University

The tour covers all the must-see sites, stories & legends of the university and ends at the viewing platform on Sparrow Hills.

Moscow Metropolitan Tour

Moscow Metro is a rapid transit system serving Moscow, Russia and the neighbouring Moscow Oblast towns. Opened in 1935.

MIBC Moscow City Tour

Moscow International Business Center “Moscow City” is a commercial district. MIBC includes 6 skyscrapers with maximum height of 300 meters or more.
